text:
Defamation Order 2017

I make the following order under section 35(3) of the Defamation Act 2005 .

29 May 2017

MATTHEW GUY GROOM

Minister for State Growth acting for and on behalf of the Minister for Justice

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Defamation Order 2017 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2017.

3. Maximum damages amount
    For the purposes of section 35(1) of the Defamation Act 2005 , the maximum damages amount that is to apply from 1 July 2017 is declared to be $389 500.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 7 June 2017

This order is administered in the Department of Justice.
